events.message: I just received my order, but the product arrived with a large scratch on the screen and it seems faulty.
The customer's issue has been categorized under Product Defect due to mention of scratch and faulty item.
Agent John has been assigned to handle this case regarding the defective product report.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the issue with your item. I'll do my best to help you today.
Could you please provide photos of the scratch and any other defects so we can proceed with your case?
I attached the photos showing the large scratch across the screen and a small crack near the button as well.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a free replacement or a full refund, whichever you prefer.
I would like to receive a replacement as soon as possible, please. Thank you for the quick response.
Your replacement has been arranged and will be shipped within 2 business days at no extra cost.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the replacement product and that everything is satisfactory.
Yes, the replacement arrived yesterday, and it is in perfect condition. Thank you for your help!
We are glad your issue was resolved. Closing the case now. Have a great day!
Please take a moment to fill out our satisfaction survey regarding your recent support experience.
